Several key academic organizational and personal change theories
Practical examples and insights into leading change

items.title: Emotional Intelligence in More Depth: Skills for the Future
items.headline: Advancing your emotional intelligence skills for better performance and more impact.
objectives_summary: Determine how to work with emotions positively to improve performance.
Explore how to practise and learn how to develop emotional intelligence at a deeper level.
Discover more ways of how emotional intelligence involves the relationship between your inner world and your outer world.

By completing this course you will master 4 disciplines that drive 89% of results: Be a Leader, Solve Problems,  Systems & Strategy Mgt, Stakeholder Solutions
Be a high performer: engage, innovate, decide, delegate, negotiate, communicate, appreciate, & evaluate brilliantly.

items.title: Be Confident in Your New Leadership/Senior Management Role

objectives_summary: Build strong relationships with key people in their organisation and industry
Generate the feelings of confidence they need to do a good job
Get organised in work so they stay on top of e-mails, meetings, phone calls and other sources of overwhelm at work
